products.name: Hollywood Regency Vintage Matson Dogwood & Bird Gold Ormolu Fluted Crystal Perfume Bottle
products.description: This stunning vintage Matson ormolu perfume bottle is simply beautiful. It is signed by Matson, Made in USA on the back of the dauber as well as on the floral base. The perfume bottle has the Mason attention to detail associated with the dogwood blossoms and birds. The bottle is lovely fluted crystal and the gold ormolu is in great condition.
